task.title: Controlling an emulated device
task.shortdesc: Opens a new Emulator Console connected to the selected AVD instance. You can use the Emulator Console to simulate hardware events, simulate telephony events, and control various aspects of the emulated device.

step.cmd: Switch to the Device Management view.

step.info: The AVD must be running; start if, if necessary.

step.cmd: From the menu that appears, select Console.
step.stepresult: The Console view is opened or brought forward, and an Emulator Console connected to the selected device is displayed. Use it to issue Emulator Console commands.

taskbody.postreq: Note that you can switch the Console view between various consoles by clicking (Display Selected Console).
